mapper.select: select s.schedule_id, s.schedule_name, s.schedule_contents, s.schedule_date, m.member_mail, s.schedule_type, s.importance, s.deadline from schedule s join member m on (s.member_mail = m.member_mail) where s.member_mail = #{member_mail} and s.schedule_type = 'personal'
select schedule_id, schedule_name, schedule_contents, schedule_date, schedule_type, importance, deadline from schedule where schedule_type = 'company'
